text: Indo-Iranian Journal is a peer-reviewed academic journal focusing on aspects of Indo-Iranian cultures. The journal was started by Jan Willem de Jong and Franciscus Bernardus Jacobus Kuiper in 1957 with Ludwig Alsdorf, Harold Walter Bailey, Louis Renou, Sumitra Mangesh Katre and Daniel H. H. Ingalls on its Editorial Board. ==References== == External links == * Category:Indology journals Category:English-language journals Category:Publications established in 1957 Category:Biannual journals Category:Brill Publishers academic journals Category:Iranian studies journals Category:Academic journals of Iran
title: Indo-Iranian Journal
